"Vasco": "The data I require this time is regarding Snowks, an ore that can be gathered in Central Kvaris."
"Unlike Pentrite, this ore formed after Kvaris' sudden cold snap."
"It is said they were originally dull stones before being buried and polished by the snow and ice."
"These stones are rather soft, so it seems they can't be used as a weapon-strengthening material."
"However, because of their brilliant lustre, they are often valued in the same manner as gemstones."
"I'll transmit details regarding the location of Snowks to your Mag. With that, I bid you the best of luck!"
